name: classes/Command.js
Command
description: Class representing a command.

name: constructor
description: Create a command.

params.name: data.aliases
params.description: List of alias names for the command.

params.name: data.parameters
params.description: List of paremeters that the command takes.

params.name: data.permission
params.description: The name of the permission required to use the command.

name: name
description: The command name.

name: aliases
description: List of alias names for the command.

name: description
description: The command description.

name: parameters
description: List of paremeters that the command takes.

name: permission
description: The name of the permission required to use the command.

name: run
description: The command function.

name: help
description: Get information about the command.

return.description: Info string containing name and description.

name: classes/DatabaseManager.js
DatabaseManager
description: Class representing a database manager.

name: constructor
description: Create a database manager.

params.name: DB_CREDENTIALS
params.description: The credentials to create the db connection. This should be filled in the config file.

params.name: DB_CREDENTIALS.password
params.description: The password associated with your user.

name: _knex
description: The knex query builder.

name: addClient
description: Insert a guild into the guild_settings table.

name: addStatus
description: Insert a status into the statuses table.

name: getClient
description: Get data on a guild from the guild_settings table

name: getStatuses
description: Get the statuses of the bot from the statuses table.

return.description: Array of statuses, name and type.

name: initialize
description: Check saved guild data against live guild data.

params.name: guilds
params.description: The bots collection of guilds at start up.

name: removeClient
description: Remove a guild from the guild_settings table.

name: updateClient
description: Update a guild entry in the guild_settings table.

params.name: data
params.description: The data to update. Property names should match column names.

name: updateDefaultStatus
description: Update the default status of the bot.

name: updateDefaultPrefix
description: Update the default prefix in the guild_settings table. Not available with SQLite.

params.name: prefix
params.description: The prefix to set as default.

name: count
description: Get the number of rows in a table.

return.description: Returns the number of rows on success or undefined.

name: del
description: Delete an entry from a table.

params.name: data.where
params.description: The condition to be met to find what to delete. Property name should match column name.

name: insert
description: Insert an entry into a table.

params.name: data.data
params.description: The data to insert. Property names should match column names.

name: select
description: Select entries from a table.

params.name: data.offset
params.description: The amount of rows to skip before selecting.

params.name: data.limit
params.description: The amount of rows to select. Will be set to all columns if null.

params.name: data.where
params.description: The condition to match your selection against. Property name should match column name.

return.description: Returns array of rows on success or undefined.

name: update
description: Update entries in a table.

params.name: data.where
params.description: The condition to be met to find what to update. Property name should match column name.

params.name: data.data
params.description: The data to update. Property names should match column names.

name: classes/Logger.js
Logger
description: Class representing a logger.

name: log
description: Log something.

params.name: str
params.description: The string to log (can also be something with a toString method).

params.name: color
params.description: The color that the message should be in.

name: success
description: Log something in green for success.

params.name: str
params.description: The string to log (can also be something with a toString method).

name: warn
description: Log something in yellow for warning.

params.name: str
params.description: The string to log (can also be something with a toString method).

name: error
description: Log something in red for error.

params.name: err
params.description: The string to log (can also be something with a toString method).

name: classes/Permission.js
Permission
description: Class representing a permission.

name: constructor
description: Create a permission.

params.name: level
params.description: The level of the permission (0 is the bottom).

params.name: check
params.description: A test to see if a member has this permission.

name: name
description: The name of the permission.

name: level
description: The level of the permission (0 is the bottom).

name: check
description: A test to see if a member has this permission.

name: deny
description: Denial message telling the user what level permission they need.

name: classes/Setting.js
Setting
description: Class representing a setting.

name: constructor
description: Create a setting.

params.name: data
params.description: An object with data to assign to the Setting.

params.name: data.onChange
params.description: A function that gets executed whenever the value of the setting is changed.

name: name
description: The name of the setting.

name: code
description: The (camelCase) code of the setting.

name: onChange
description: A function that gets executed whenever the value of the setting is changed.

name: value
description: The value of the setting.

name: setValue
description: Sets the value of the setting.

name: save
description: Save settings to file.

name: classes/Status.js
Status
description: Class representing the bot status.

name: constructor
description: Create a status.

name: current
description: The current status.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the current status.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of the current status.

name: interval
description: The interval for automatic status changes

name: default
description: Set the status to the default.

name: endRotate
description: Stop changing status automatically

name: setStatus
description: Set the status of the bot

params.name: status
params.description: Status to set to, if none is given it will be chosen at random

params.name: status.type
params.description: Type of status. 0 is playing, 1 is streaming (Twitch only [Unsupported]), 2 is listening, 3 is watching.

name: startRotate
description: Set the status of the bot

name: classes/StatusType.js
num
description: Enum for status types

name: getStatusName
description: Get a status type string by num.

name: classes/Toggle.js
Toggle
description: Class representing a Toggle.

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} value The value of the Toggle.

name: enable
description: Set the value of the Toggle to true.

name: disable
description: Set the value of the Toggle to false.

content:
# eris-boiler
A Discord Bot boilerplate using JavaScript and the Eris library
# Documentation
Class documentation can be found [here](https://alex-taxiera.github.io/eris-boiler/)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "eris-boiler",
  "version": "2.0.0b",
  "description": "A Discord Bot boilerplate using JavaScript and the Eris library",
  "main": "bot.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "mocha --recursive test & standard & nodemon",
    "doc": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/alex-taxiera/eris-boiler.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "discord",
    "bot",
    "boiler",
    "help"
  ],
  "author": "Alex Taxiera",
  "license": "GPL-3.0",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/alex-taxiera/eris-boiler/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/alex-taxiera/eris-boiler#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "colors": "^1.2.1",
    "eris": "^0.8.5",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-custom-theme": "^1.4.2",
    "esdoc-inject-style-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-node": "^1.0.3",
    "esdoc-publish-html-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "knex": "^0.14.4",
    "moment": "^2.21.0",
    "mysql": "^2.15.0",
    "npm": "^5.7.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "mocha": "^5.0.5",
    "nodemon": "^1.17.2",
    "standard": "^10.0.3"
  }
}
name: package.json
